subject: Soccer
Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Coach Jurgen Klinsmann on Monday announced a 23-man roster for two international friendly matches that was a mix of M.L.S. players and European-based pros.
snippet: Coach Jurgen Klinsmann on Monday announced a 23-man roster for two international friendly matches that was a mix of M.L.S. players and European-based pros.
